title: CLI: Add reply command for comments
description: Add 'cerebro comments reply <parent-id> <text>' command in src/cli/index.ts. Should: 1) Look up parent comment to get file_path, line_number, branch, repo_id 2) Create new comment with parent_id set 3) No --repo flag needed since we get it from parent. Don't auto-resolve parent.

title: State: Make resolveComment repo-agnostic
description: Update resolveComment in src/state/index.ts to look up repo_id from comment ID instead of requiring it as parameter. Update CLI in src/cli/index.ts to not require repo resolution for resolve command. Comment IDs are globally unique so we can find repo from the comment itself.

title: Schema: Add parent_id column to comments table
description: Add parent_id TEXT column to comments table in src/state/db.ts initSchema(). Update Comment type in src/types/index.ts and web/src/api/types.ts to include parent_id?: string. This is the foundation for threading.

title: State: Make dismissNote repo-agnostic
description: Update dismissNote in src/state/index.ts to look up repo_id from note ID instead of requiring it as parameter. Update CLI in src/cli/index.ts to not require repo resolution for notes dismiss command. Note IDs are globally unique.

title: UI: Render threaded comments
description: Update web/src/App.tsx and related components to group comments by thread. Comments with parent_id should render as replies under their parent. Show visual hierarchy (indentation or nested styling). Update useDiff hook if needed to structure comments as threads.

title: State: Normalize file paths to relative
description: In src/state/index.ts addComment and addNote functions, normalize file_path to be relative to repo root before storing. Use path.relative(repoPath, filePath). This ensures consistent file grouping regardless of how path was provided.
